DocAttribute.Name: OperationType
DocAttribute.Documentation: Types of window panel operations. Also used to assign standard symbolic presentations according to national building standards.

DocAttribute.Name: PanelPosition
DocAttribute.Documentation: Position of this panel within the overall window style.

DocAttribute.Name: FrameDepth
DocAttribute.Documentation: Depth of panel frame, measured from front face to back face horizontally (i.e. perpendicular to the window (elevation) plane.

DocAttribute.Name: FrameThickness
DocAttribute.Documentation: Width of panel frame, measured from inside of panel (at glazing) to outside of panel (at lining), i.e. parallel to the window (elevation) plane.

DocAttribute.Name: ShapeAspectStyle
DocAttribute.Documentation: Optional link to a shape aspect definition, which points to the part of the geometric representation of the window style, which is used to represent the panel.
